name: simple-chat
description: Simple chat on express.js and socket.io on back and vue.js on front

name: bdo-market-wait-list
description: Discord.js bot for web-scraping black desert market registration queue
details: The project is built on the discord.js library. Data is obtained by accessing the web marketplace API and scraping the web page (for coupons).

name: mcgl.polypha.ga
details: The site consists of four pages: the main page, a page with a search for leaked data, a page with the history of the project in the form of a timeline, and a page with hacks and scripts for the game. The search is carried out at the level of sql queries. Hacks page has authorization to access content.

name: simple-blog
description: A simple blog with the implementation of user management, roles and published content
details: The site implements registration (without confirmation), creation and privilege of roles and rights, management of material, comments.

name: startup-it-test
description: Small test task. It is an online library with the ability to add resources, links to them, link them to tags and search for them

name: helper-bot
description: Discord.js bot for answering popular questions. Includes web-ui for editing bot answers

name: tcp-servers-status
details: A small service and web application that pings tcp ports and maintains latency statistics with subsequent visualization in charts.js.
